short_description: imide wires is a scrap metals supplier based in new delhi, india.
long_description: we have bright and ambitious minds from around the world, in direct or indirect association with our manufacturing units to enable us to bring the best technology from around the world for the development of high-grade winding wires. the distribution system works with a network of certified product dealers. our channels have been supplying the wire across indian and overseas market. our team has been constantly growing as we seek for improvement in every domain of our work. as you bring to us new opportunities and ideas to scale our process, for procurement, manufacturing, management and market distribution, the company invites you to discuss and shape your thoughts into reality. our supplies meet the market demand around the year, with customised supplies as per work season. value for money (vfm) analysis ensures greatest return on the purchase of quality and certified winding wire that delivers maximum value over its work life. our products are manufactured in a well-equipped plant with well-defined and meticulously documented quality systems, under a team of experienced professionals and technical personnel.
business_tags: copper wire | submersible winding wire | enameled copper wire | electrical and wiring | equipment & plant
generated_description: imide winding wires, legally known as bee kay wires pvt. ltd., is a prominent manufacturer of winding wires based in new delhi, india. established in 1976 by mr. s d gupta, the company specializes in producing a wide range of high-quality winding wires, including copper and aluminum enamelled wires, motor winding wires, magnet wires, and submersible wires. with over 40 years of experience, bee kay wires pvt. ltd. is committed to delivering superior products and maintaining a strong presence in both the indian and international markets. the company emphasizes quality control and the use of advanced technology to ensure the production of reliable and efficient winding wires.
generated_business_tags: super enamelled copper wire manufacturer | manufacturing | submersible pump wire manufacturer | magnet wire manufacturer
